<saturation>: very pale | pale | greyish | moderately saturated | strongish | strong | vivid
<brightness>: very dark | dark | medium | light | very light
<pure-hue>: red | orange | yellow | green | blue | purple
<in-between-hue>: orangish red | reddish orange | yellowish orange | orangeish yellow | greenish yellow | yellowish green | bluish green | greenish blue | purplish blue | bluish purple | reddish purple | purplish red
<gloss>: very matt | matt | silk | silky | glossy | very glossy
<polish>: very polished | polished | rough | very rough
<transparency>: transparent | nearly transparent | semi-transparent | nearly opaque | opaque
<glow>: very faintly glowing | faintly glowing | glowing | brightly glowing | very brightly glowing
